title: I made a Monster high Repaint of New Evelynn!
body:
I don't know how to add pictures properly but here are some pics of her!

https://imgur.com/a/h41iJ

replies.body: Oh cool! :D I don't think I've ever seem something like this before, what a creative idea ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XeZchFUp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-11T19:38:34.968+0000)
>
> Oh cool! :D I don't think I've ever seem something like this before, what a creative idea ^^

:D! Thank you!

Y'know, when the page didn't show anything for a good 30 seconds I figured it was just another one of the invisible Eve jokes.  So I scrolled down to the comment section and was confused by the lack of "I see what you did there." jokes.  I scrolled back up and had a heart attack. (I love it though)

> [{quoted}](name=DaenrysTargaryen,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XeZchFUp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-11T18:48:22.725+0000)
>
> creepy yet cool

Thanks! I kind of rushed her,but it took 2 days,some yarn ,paint and acetone. Very fun!
